application

Class TitleScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Screen
      • application.TitleScreen

  • public class TitleScreen
extends Screen
    The GUI for the title screen. Contains the UI elements that make up the title screen, and methods to build them.
    Author:
    Gideon Davies.

      • checkLogin

        private UserProfile checkLogin(java.lang.String username,
                               java.lang.String password)
        Checks that the entered login details are valid and match to an existing profile.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the profile to be searched.
        password - The password of the profile to be searched.
        Returns:
        The matching user profile, or null if it can't be found.
